Hymn.Arabic: قوتى وتسبحتى هو الرب , وصار لى خلاصا .
Hymn.English: 14 The Lord is my strength and song, And He has become my salvation.

Hymn.Arabic: صوت التهليل والخلاص فى مساكن الأبرار .
Hymn.English: 15 The voice of rejoicing and salvation Is in the tents of the righteous; The right hand of the Lord does valiantly.

Hymn.Arabic: يمين الرب صنعت قوة . يمين الرب رفعتنى , يمين الرب صنعت قوة .   الليلويا
Hymn.English: 16 The right hand of the Lord is exalted; The right hand of the Lord does valiantly.
